page.title: 07TEACHERS
page.content: In 1985 teachers went on strike. Only a few schools were not on strike. In Flixton the Boys' Secondary School were on strike at times but the junior school over the road was not affected. Teachers help you when you don't understand your work but don't give you any homework during the week. Teachers do not like bad behaviour from their class and don't like too much noise when they take the register. Teachers mark in red only. Teachers do not wear school uniform. Teachers get work as well as the children because they have to mark right or wrong. The Teachers hardly ever join in the songs in assembly and they tell you when your work is bad.
